law.catch_line: Modification of the terms of the subscribers' agreement or power of attorney of a domestic reciproca...

text.section: Modification of the terms of the subscribers' agreement or power of attorney of a domestic reciprocal insurer shall be made jointly by the attorney in fact of the reciprocal insurer and the subscribers' advisory committee.
A modification described in subsection (a) of this section is not effective retroactively and does not apply to an insurance contract issued before the modification.
